column1: Smoque BBQ////I never blame a place for being popular
column2: but Smoque is too small (a picture taken in January clearly illustrates this). It can seat about 20 on the left
column4: but the tables and chairs are really close to each other. It's hard to move around when the place is busy (this is an understatement)
column5: and you may also find yourself waiting to be seated (there are some chairs by the restrooms
column6: and people were constantly walking by my wife and I).
